          <title>
            <string language="en">Current in series circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strom im Serie Stromkreis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courant en série circuit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Corrente em série circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrente in serie circuito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρεύμα στο κύκλωμα σειράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Corriente en circuito de la serie</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagrams shows two light bulbs connected in series to a cell and an ammeter.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammeter</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Schaltpläne zeigt zwei Glühlampen, die 
in der Serie an eine Zelle und einen Amperemeter angeschlossen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les schémas de circuit ce montre deux ampoules 
reliées en série à une cellule et à un ampèremètre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os diagramas deste circuito mostram dois bulbos 
claros conectados em série a uma pilha e a um amperímetro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schemi circuitali questo mostra due lampadine 
collegate in serie ad una cellula e ad un amperometro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα διαγράμματα αυτών των κυκλωμάτων δύο ελαφριούς 
βολβούς που συνδέονται εμφανίζουν στη σειρά με ένα κύτταρο και 
ένα αμπερόμετρο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los esquemas circulares este muestran dos 
bombillas conectadas en serie con una célula y un amperímetro.</string>
          </description>
